thread.title: Calvin Ayre to Participate in MIGS15 Panel Discussion "Century of Gaming"
thread.title_full: Calvin Ayre to Participate in MIGS15 Panel Discussion "Century of Gaming" - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Calvin Ayre to Participate in MIGS15 Panel Discussion "Century of Gaming"
text:
CalvinAyre.com
LONDON , October 19,
Calvin Ayre , the Canadian entrepreneur and founder of the Bodog entertainment brand, has confirmed that he will participate in the panel discussion "Century of Gaming" on the 17 th November at MIGS 15, in Malta at the Corinthia Hotel in St. Julian's.
Mr. Ayre grew Bodog into one of the global gambling industry's most recognized and trusted brands, earning him a spot on the cover of Forbes' 2006 Billionaires issue.
Ayre ceased from an active role in Bodog's gambling operations years ago but has maintained a presence in the business through CalvinAyre.com, which launched in 2009 and has become a high profile source for gambling industry news. Ayre currently resides in Antigua and shares his time between overseeing his charitable Calvin Ayre Foundation and discovering promising new technology and finance companies in which to invest.?
"The Century of Gambling" panel discussion will also feature other iGaming veterans such as Paris Smith , current CEO of Pinnacle Sports, Mark Blandford , founder of Sportingbet Plc, Pontus Lindwall , current CEO of Betsson AB and the retired CEO of Novamatic Group, Dr. Franz Wohlfahrt not to mention Sue Schneider from Egaming Brokerage who will be moderating the discussion.
The experience, success stories and unique perspective of these visionary leaders will truly make this panel discussion "Century of Gaming" on the 17 th of November a must attend for all C-level managers within the industry.
For more information on the Malta iGaming Seminar go to their website http://www.maltaigamingseminar.com/ , follow them on Facebook , Twitter
Or LinkedIn
